name: UniCredit S.p.A.
description: UniCredit S.p.A. is a prominent Italian global banking and financial services company. Established in 1998, UniCredit operates in 17 countries, serving millions of customers through a network of over 4,000 branches. The bank provides a comprehensive range of financial products and services, including retail banking, corporate banking, investment banking, asset management, and private banking. UniCredit is recognized for its strong presence in Central and Eastern Europe, making it one of the leading financial institutions in the region. The bank emphasizes digital transformation and innovation, aiming to enhance customer experience through cutting-edge technology and streamlined services. With a commitment to sustainable finance, UniCredit actively supports projects that promote environmental sustainability and social responsibility. The company is also focused on improving its efficiency and profitability while managing risks effectively. As part of its growth strategy, UniCredit seeks to strengthen its capital base, optimize its operations, and expand its service offerings to meet the evolving needs of its clients.

seo.meta_title: UniCredit S.p.A. | Global Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore UniCredit S.p.A., a leading banking institution providing a wide range of financial services across Europe, with a focus on innovation and sustainability.

faq.question: What services does UniCredit offer?
faq.answer: UniCredit offers a variety of services including retail banking, corporate banking, investment banking, asset management, and private banking.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of UniCredit?
faq.answer: Andrea Orcel is the CEO of UniCredit S.p.A.

faq.question: Where is UniCredit headquartered?
faq.answer: UniCredit is headquartered in Milan, Italy.
